JUDGES: Christos Rozakis;Elisabeth Steiner;Giorgio Malinverni;Loukis Loucaides;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the town of GPE in GPE .
CARDINAL . The applicant is a GPE pensioner . She sued ORG for the unpaid allowances .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of GPE ( “ the Town Court ” ) awarded her the unpaid disability allowance over the period DATE and DATE in the amount of MONEY ( RUB ) . The judgment entered into force on DATE . It was enforced in full on DATE .

CARDINAL . By a judgment of DATE ORG awarded the applicant the unpaid food and disability allowances over the period DATE and DATE in the amount of RUB CARDINAL and RUB MONEY respectively . The judgment acquired legal force on DATE . It appears that it has not been enforced to date .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG recovered in the applicant 's favour the unpaid disability allowance over the period DATE and DATE in the amount of RUB CARDINAL . The judgment became final on DATE . It was fully enforced on DATE .

CARDINAL . By a judgment of CARDINAL May CARDINAL ORG awarded the applicant the unpaid disability allowance over the period DATE and DATE in the amount of RUB CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL . The court also increased the DATE disability allowance to RUB MONEY as of DATE and held that it had to be index - linked in accordance with legislation . On CARDINAL DATE the judgment acquired legal force . On DATE ORG ordered to increase the applicant 's DATE disability allowance to RUB MONEY . On DATE the applicant received RUB CARDINAL .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG recovered in the applicant 's favour the unpaid food allowance over the period DATE and DATE in the amount of RUB CARDINAL and the unpaid DATE disability allowance for DATE in the amount of RUB CARDINAL . The court also increased the applicant 's DATE food allowance to RUB MONEY as of DATE and ordered to index - link it in accordance with legislation . The court further held that as of DATE ORG was to pay the applicant an DATE disability allowance and to index - link it in accordance with legislation . The judgment entered into force on DATE . It appears that it has not been enforced to date .

CARDINAL . NORP On DATE ORG awarded the applicant RUB PERSON for the unpaid disability allowance over the period between CARDINAL April CARDINAL and DATE . On DATE the judgment acquired legal force . It was fully enforced on DATE .
